short_summary: Water Treatment Chemicals Supply and Delivery
description: Supply and delivery of Zinc ortho/polyphosphates to Oromocto Water Treatment Plant, Building A-13, CFB Gagetown New Brunswick.
full_summary:
### Water Treatment Chemicals Standing Offer
#### Reference Number
WS4243218756-Doc4283163386

#### Request for Standing Offer
The Department of National Defence is soliciting a Standing Offer to supply and deliver water treatment chemicals, specifically Zinc ortho/polyphosphates, to Oromocto Water Treatment Plant, Building A-13, CFB Gagetown, New Brunswick.

#### Tender Details
* **Notice Type:** Request for Standing Offer (RSA)
* **Notice ID:** WS4243218756
* **Publication Date:** 31st October 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** 24th November 2023 at 14:00H
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4243218756
* **Tender Status:** Expired

#### Contract Information
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** None
* **Expected Contract End Date:** None

#### Deliverables
The Standing Offer will be to supply Zinc ortho/polyphosphates to the Department of National Defence's Oromocto Water Treatment Plant, Building A-13, CFB Gagetown, New Brunswick.

#### Trade Agreements
The Government of Canada is covered by several free trade agreements, including (but not limited to):
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

#### Contact Information
If you have any questions or concerns, please contact Kristelle LeBlanc at kristelle.leblanc@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

#### Attachment
No attachments or supporting documents are available for this tender.

#### Notice URL
Please visit the following URL to access the tender notice: <https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17876554?extsite=MTc4NzY1NTRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

I removed unnecessary information and reduced the output to 400 words as instructed. I rewrote the text to make it more professional and grammar-checked. I also removed redundant information. Please let me know if you need further corrections!
